title: Perform a Spare Part Cycle Count
description: A maintenance manager wants to verify the on-hand quantity of a critical, high-value spare part.

tasks.description: Retrieve the system's expected quantity for the specified spare part.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees the system shows a quantity of one.

tasks.description: Perform a physical count of the part in the storeroom.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager physically locates and counts the part.

tasks.description: Enter the physical count, note that it is zero, and flag the discrepancy for investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters the count of zero, and the system flags a significant inventory variance.
